title: TightVNC closes gracefully using mRemoteNG
author: TerriWright
body_snippet:
TightVNC 2.8.27 closes gracefully using mRemoteNG

When trying to connect with TightVNC using mRemoteNG v1.76.20.24669, connection gracefully closes.

Using Linux v 3.10 on 64bit

Tunnel set

iterations.description: TightVNC connections are closing unexpectedly without explicit error messages, indicating an underlying issue that causes the 'graceful' disconnection.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): TightVNC connections are closing unexpectedly without explicit error messages, indicating an underlying issue that causes the 'graceful' disconnection.
Approach: Investigate the `VNCEvent_Disconnected` handler and other event subscriptions in `mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/VNC/Connection.Protocol.VNC.cs` to understand why `VncSharpCore.RemoteDesktop` might be disconnecting unexpectedly. This may involve adding detailed logging around `VncSharpCore` events to identify the trigger for these 'graceful' closures.
